group.name: group
group.lit: Your login name or ID is not registered. Please contact your administrator. (option {loginOption})
No account matches the prefix {prefix}. Please check your URL.
Your account does not have access to this title. (product code={productCode} root={rootID})
That name or id and/or password are not correct. Please try again. (option {loginOption})
Your user account expired on {expiryDate}. Please contact your administrator.
More than one user matches these details. Please contact your administrator. (login option {loginOption})
No such group exists. Please contact your administrator.
Can't set the instance ID for user {userID}. Please contact your support@clarityenglish.com.
Can't get the instance ID for user {userID}. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com.
Someone else has logged in with your details. Please try again. ({instanceID})
This account has not set the login options ({loginOption})
The key field can't be empty ({loginOption})
Your group has been blocked from using this program. Please contact your teacher or administrator for help.
Sorry, these details have already been used, please try again. (login option {loginOption})
Sorry, you don't have permission to run this program. (type is {userType})
Your account hasn't started yet. Please contact your administrator.
Your account expired on {expiryDate}. Please contact your administrator.
This licence is full, please contact your administrator.
This licence is full, please try again later.
Error reading licence control table. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com.
The licence type {licenceType} is not recognised. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com.
Error, can't find this licence {licenceID}. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com.
Error, can't update this licence {licenceID}. Please contact your support@clarityenglish.com.
Error, can't delete this licence {licenceID}. Please contact your support@clarityenglish.com.
Error, can't allocate a licence number
This licence can only run from certain computers. Your IP is {ip}.
This licence can only run from certain websites. You came from {referrer}.
This licence can only run from certain computers or websites. You came from {referrer} with {ip}.
Unable to load data for everyone's summary.
The menu xml has more than one exercise node with id={exerciseID}
Database can't find auto-increment session id
Unable to read exercise {filename} ({message}). Please contact support@clarityenglish.com with the file name.

Unable to find any Exercise nodes in the menu xml matching {href}
The menu xml has no exercise node with id={exerciseID}
Error reading from the database. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com.
Error writing to the database. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com.
This program is not running in a recognised SCORM LMS.
This URL isn't recognised as a YouTube video. Click 'share' under a YouTube video and copy the URL, something like http://youtu.be/oSn3i4vsGeY
Error saving this course. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com.
Error saving publication dates for this course.
Somebody is already editing this course. Please try again later.
You need to have already registered your email with your school or with British Council to log in.
Please type your login details to continue.
Please type your login details if you want to save your progress records.
Register for the IELTS test with the British Council and you will receive the Last Minute version of Road to IELTS free!
Welcome to Road to IELTS. Click the buttons on the right to look at the resources to help with each skill.
The colour bars show how much you have completed in each skill area. Go to My Progress for more details.
You logged in anonymously, so your progress will not be saved.
This shows how you have spent your time
You have spent {x} minute(s) in total
The two new passwords you typed must be the same.
Sorry, these details can't be updated.
Are you sure you want to leave this exercise?
(You will lose your work in this exercise.)
